posts.post_content:
going to auction......- severely O/C  T-B Griffith- Portrait Brown Hindu

xxx OBO delivered.. going to auction after BVG grading....
I'm glad Leon posted the photo --- it became the picture in my story about our trip to where Leon picked up this card

Can you please restore the scans of this card.

Thanx,

TED Z

Teddy, we used the scans in my Rich Klein's Ramblings story on Sports Collectors Daily.com. You can find those scans there :)
